item.title: What if domain name auctions went both ways?

description.div: Buying a domain name is a strange process. It's a piece of digital property, yet it's afflicted by the most physical of problems...

item.author: Michael Storm

description.div: A talented engineer I interviewed the other day told me about a project she'd built as an intern: a network traffic visualizer in D3. Which is pretty cool, and a perfect portfolio project for an intern. I asked why she'd built it, and she said, "For security." The idea was to visualize traffic so that a human could spot...
